overview: The experienced emergency doctor Alexander Arkadievich and his assistant Kolya hurry to finish their shift so they can go and watch a football match. But when they arrive at their last call, they understand that it’s not so simply to solve. In a fit of jealousy, the wife has cut off her husband’s finger and doesn’t want to give him the finger until he confesses his mistake and apologizes. To save the patient’s finger, the doctors have to interfere and solve the couple’s conflict first.
title: Doc, Call The Doctor!
